meanings.sent1: The alcyonarian swayed gently in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent2: I learned about different types of coral, including the alcyonarian.
meanings.sent3: The alcyonarian decided to throw a coral party for all its friends.
meanings.sent4: The alcyonarian's beauty was as delicate as a flower in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The alcyonarian's vibrant colors made it stand out among the other sea creatures.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of soft corals.
meanings.sent1: The underwater scene was filled with alcyonarian beauty.
meanings.sent2: Her necklace was inspired by the alcyonarian hues of the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The alcyonarian music played softly in the background of the coral reef.
meanings.sent4: His painting captured the essence of the alcyonarian world.
meanings.sent5: The alcyonarian texture of the fabric reminded her of the ocean waves.
